body_html: @klappradla sure thing, I'd suggest that we use the Foundation CC that @anikalindtner has access to for this. Possibly, since we were thinking of creating a Google account for everything RGSoC-related anyway as once suggested by Ana (to keep all docs, etc... in the same place) we could also generate new API keys then, if you want (doesn't have to be though).

body: @klappradla sure thing, I'd suggest that we use the Foundation CC that @anikalindtner has access to for this. Possibly, since we were thinking of creating a Google account for everything RGSoC-related anyway as once suggested by Ana (to keep all docs, etc... in the same place) we could also generate new API keys then, if you want (doesn't have to be though).
